resources.string:
Are you sure you want to delete the Kennel titled "%1$s"? Deleting this will also delete any images you have uploaded along with any reviews that may have been posted for this Kennel by Pet Parents. 

Deleting this is permanent and as soon as the Kennel is deleted, it will no longer be shown to Pet Parents in the Zen Pets application. 

To confirm, press the "Delete" button.
